name: Herman-Scheer
tagline: We bring smart consumer brands to market.
description: Herman-Scheer is a brand studio and launch partner - we’re informed by research and strategy, but build with experience and intuition — the results are brands that connect with consumers on a more human level. We move quickly, but thoughtfully. Each step of our process is designed to navigate the entrepreneurial journey towards a successful launch. Beyond launch, we act as an extension of your team by providing continued support with strategy, creative and partnerships.
